item.title: Back when I was 15 I was publishing TI-83 games online. I'm that cool.
item.description: TI-83 Basic was one of my first introductions to programming devices. There was just something so fascinating to me about being able to build something that ran on a handheld device (and it didnt hurt that schools allowed you to use it in classrooms).
